item.title: Apache Doxia Site Tools Version 1.9 Released
item.description: The Apache Maven team is pleased to announce the release of the Doxia Site Tools Version 1.9, Released Doxia Sitetools is an extension of base Doxia component that generates either HTML sites, consisting of decoration and content that was generated by Doxia, or documents like RTF or PDF. Release Notes - Maven Doxia base - Version 1.9 You can download the appropriate sources etc. from the download page. Release Notes - Maven Doxia Sitetools - Version 1.
